Dungeon Master 22-Feb-19 08:59 PM
You have been traveling on a small ship, the Bottom Feeder, for three days now. You've been contracted to take supplies to the small frontier village of Gramsby, though you may have other reasons for wanting to visit the small mining town. Your path has taken you down the coast of Issir, up the Murky River, and you have reached the point where the Bottom Feeder can not navigate any farther upstream. This was expected however; you were told to expect wagons on a small dock, which would allow you to take your goods the rest of the way to Gramsby. Unfortunately the wagons were not there when you arrived yesterday afternoon, nor have they appeared in the time since. The ship's captain is tired of waiting however, and you have been unceremoniously dumped on the dock along with several heavy crates, and you now see the Bottom Feeder sailing back towards the coast.

PHB p.20 racially specific (e.g. dwarf) Darkvision: You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light. You canâ€™t discern color in darkness, only shades of gray. Monster Manual p9 "monster" specific Darkvision: A monster with darkvision can see in the dark within a specific radius.
